page.title: 18THE BEECHAMS
page.content: THE NEXT FAMILY TO PUT MONEY INTO MURSLEY WERE THE{BEECHAMS}OF THE PILL FAME.THEY BOUGHT MURSLEY HALL AND ITS FARMLANDS.THEY BUILT A ROW OF COTTAGES IN STATION ROAD.WE SAW THESE WITH THE INITIALS "T.B."AND THE DATE 1888 IN THE BRICKWORK.THOMAS WAS A LOVER OF MUSIC AND HIS GRANDSON,ALSO CALLED THOMAS,BECAME THE FAMOUS CONDUCTOR.HE LIVED IN THE HOUSE FOR SOMETIME WITH HIS WIFE AND CHILDREN.THE HOUSE UNFORTUNATELY WAS BURNT DOWN IN THE 1950'S AND THE LAND WAS USED TO BUILD A SMALL ESTATE OF HIGH CLASS HOUSES WHICH WE NOW KNOW AS THE "BEECHAMS". TODAY{LORD CARRINGTON}OWNS A GREAT DEAL OF LAND IN MURSLEY STRETCHING TO DRAYTON PARSLOW.IN DRAYTON PARSLOW THE VILLAGE HALL IS CALLED "CARRINGTON HALL"AFTER HIS FAMILY.
